Text: Note: We have many seeders and peers on this great offering -although its showing zero seeders at the system here has some glitches it would appear. Please fix. Thanks, Michael Rizzo
The problem with this is that it's not from HD source, as there isn't an HD version of the movie. My media centre does a better job of upscaling the SD version than this.
This is indeed from a 4GB version of an HD movie file. It is NOT an upscale - so there!
